column1: # Title: IEA ammonia production technology characteristics by region
# Units: production is in Mt of NH3; shares are unitless; energy consumption of the three fuels - and avg - are in GJ/tNH3; fuel use - i.e. last column - is in PJ/year
# Source: Table 4.15 of IEA 2007 Tracking Industrial Energy Efficiency and CO2 Emissions; https://www.iea.org/publications/freepublications/publication/tracking_emissions.pdf
